text: فَأَخۡرَجَ لَهُمۡ عِجۡلٗا جَسَدٗا لَّهُۥ خُوَارٞ فَقَالُواْ هَٰذَآ إِلَٰهُكُمۡ وَإِلَٰهُ مُوسَىٰ فَنَسِيَ

translation.en: And he extracted for them [the statue of] a calf which had a lowing sound, and they said, "This is your god and the god of Moses, but he forgot
translation.id: kemudian (dari lubang api itu) dia (Samiri) mengeluarkan (patung) anak sapi yang bertubuh dan bersuara520) untuk mereka, maka mereka berkata, "Inilah Tuhanmu dan Tuhannya Musa, tetapi dia (Musa) telah lupa
